overview: In former life a lawyer, Friedrich von Scanzoni joined in the Corporate Development of Bertelsmann in 2000. In 2003 he was promoted Director to the European Business Development to Lycos Europe. In 2006 he became Head of Corporate Development of Tomorrow Focus AG, a leading German Online company and part of the Hubert Burda Media Group. In this function he was responsible for the acquisition of HolidayCheck. He is now leading the International Business there as Managing Director.
